title: Development of a genetically encoded NMT indicator for detection of mercury ions based on the green fluorescent protein mNeonGreen and metallothionein II from rat liver

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Oksana M. Subach, Kiryl D. Piatkevich, Fedor V. Subach
